title: Sony’s PlayStation Chief to Retire Next Year
description: Jim Ryan, who has been with the company for nearly 30 years, has led one of the most dominant businesses in the video game industry.

title: The New ChatGPT Can ‘See’ and ‘Talk.’ Here’s What It’s Like.
description: The image-recognition feature could have many uses, and the voice feature is even more intriguing.

title: With Meta’s Quest 3, Mixed Reality Is Here. So Now What?
description: The new $500 headset lets people see the outside world while immersed in virtual reality. The benefits are to be determined.

title: To Bring Socializing Back to Social Networks, Apps Try A.I. Imagery
description: Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat and several newcomers are betting on artificial intelligence to rejuvenate the fun, interactivity and whimsy of creating and sharing images.

title: Meet the A.I. Jane Austen: Meta Weaves A.I. Throughout Its Apps
description: Meta introduced artificially intelligent characters based on Jane Austen, Snoop Dogg and others into Instagram, Facebook and WhatsApp, as the race to lead the technology heats up.

title: With Meta’s Quest 3, Mixed Reality Is Here. So Now What?
description: The new $500 headset lets people see the outside world while immersed in virtual reality. The benefits are to be determined.

title: Lina Khan vs. Jeff Bezos: This Is Big Tech’s Real Cage Match
description: The chair of the Federal Trade Commission wants to disrupt Amazon, whose founder built a trillion-dollar firm by disrupting retail.

title: E.U. Law Sets the Stage for a Clash Over Disinformation
description: The law, aimed at forcing social media giants to adopt new policies to curb harmful content, is expected to face blowback from Elon Musk, who owns X.
